title: Tipo | 4 Font Releases | Botija, Lineare, Malena, Titulata
content:
We are glad to present our first 4 fonts families at Tipo. Latin American type foundry with an ambitious objective: to supply digital types of high quality to everybody.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tipo_4fonts_6073.jpg)

Estamos felices de anunciarles el lanzamiento de las primeras 4 familias tipográficas de Tipo, fundidora latinoamericana, que tiene un ambicioso objetivo: surtir de tipos digitales de alta calidad a todo el mundo.

More Information:  
 [www.tipo.net.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192017/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/ "www.tipo.net.ar")
author: fontime

comments.content:
Tim

Thanks for your praise.

Eduardo Rodríguez Tunni  
 [www.tipo.net.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192017/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/ "www.tipo.net.ar")

Tipo, your fonts are great but may I respectfully suggest that your prices ($32-$40 per font with no bundle discounts) are more than double what they should be in order to move new product--or, you should hold a deep-discount sale at MyFonts for long enough to permit us impoverished freelancers, who buy their own type, to buy yours and spread the word.

John

Thanks for your comment, today, we are evaluating this topic.

Eduardo Rodríguez Tunni  
 [www.tipo.net.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012192017/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/ "www.tipo.net.ar")
